education.title: ROC van twente
education.subtitle: Software developer
education.description:
I'm currently in my third year of a four-year Software Development program at ROC van Twente, where I focus primarily on game development using Unity. Alongside game projects, I have also worked on websites and MonoGame.

My passion for programming started as a hobby but I wanted to get more in-depth with it.

education.title: ROC van twente
education.subtitle: Independent working baker
education.description:
During my training to become an independent baker, I focused mainly on pastries, cakes, and other sweet baked goods.

I gained hands-on experience in the bakery, alongside studying ingredient science, baking techniques, hygiene, and scheduling.

experiences.title: TotalReality
experiences.subtitle: Intern software developer
experiences.description:
During my internship at TotalReality, I worked on several AR and VR projects, both for clients and for the companies own platform. I was involved in different parts of the process, from research and idea development to building and testing, mostly using Unity.

Working closely with the team, I learned a lot about how things work in a real software company and got hands-on experience with immersive tech.

experiences.title: Zoete kruimels
experiences.subtitle: Intern Pastry baker
experiences.description: During my internship at Zoete Kruimels, I mostly worked under the guidance of a team leader, but as part of my studies, I also took on tasks independently.

experiences.title: Nienke's cupcakes
experiences.subtitle: Intern Pastry baker
experiences.description:
During my internship at Nienke's Cupcakes, I was involved in both day-to-day operations and special projects.

While I often collaborated with the team, I also had opportunities to take initiative and handle tasks on my own as part of my study requirements.
